pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, September 4, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Owen Sound, Ontario

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with small business owners regarding rural broadband high-speed internet access. 

Mudtown Station
1198 1st Avenue East

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.
